EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Wednesday Highlights 12-6-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Hear from Boeing, Google, DIUX, VMware, the Cloud Foundry Foundation, and more!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/speakers]]> Book Signings
Meet Pivotal's authors and pick up a free book or two! Book Signings are from 1pm-2pm at the Pivotal booth on Level 2.
Free Shirt!
Complete the conference survey in the SpringOne mobile app to get your free t-shirt.
Food Extravaganza
Breakfast begins at 7:30am and lunch starts at 12:40pm. Stop by Level 2 and get your grub on!
Hub Social Join us on Level 2 for drinks, bites and good times starting at 6:10pm.
Questions or concerns? Send us an email to platform@pivotal.io <[[mailto:platform@pivotal.io]]>.
SpringOne Platform on social media: #springone <[[http://info.pivotal.io/n0IY0pk02lAN0JU05x00Cgo]]>, @s1p <[[http://info.pivotal.io/qxJI0C05Nm0Aog02U0Yr00l]]>
Thank you, The SpringOne Platform Team
